General.Name: TCL Zhonghuan Renewable Energy Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: TCL Zhonghuan Renewable Energy Technology Co.,Ltd. provides semiconductor materials and devices in China and internationally. The company offers new energy photovoltaic silicon wafers, photovoltaic cells and components, and other silicon materials; and photovoltaic monocrystalline silicon rods and silicon wafers. Further, it engages in financial leasing business. Its products are used in integrated circuits, consumer electronics, grid transmission, wind power generation, rail transit, new energy vehicles, 5G, artificial intelligence, photovoltaic power generation, industrial control, and other industries. The company was formerly known as Tianjin Zhonghuan Semiconductor Co., Ltd. and changed its name to TCL Zhonghuan Renewable Energy Technology Co.,Ltd. in June 2022. TCL Zhonghuan Renewable Energy Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Tianjin, China.
General.Address: No. 12 East Haitai Road, Tianjin, China, 300384
